title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
2 points are earned for definite integral

2 points are deducted for faulty f, g, or u

1 point is earned for correct antiderivative

1 point is earned for evaluation of anti derivative

V = π ∫ 0 1 e 2 x − ( x − 1 ) 4 d x = π [ e 2 x 2 ] 0 1 − π [ 1 5 ( x − 1 ) 5 ] | 0 1 = π [ ( e 2 2 − 1 2 ) − 1 5 ] = π ( e 2 2 − 7 10 ) )

or

V = 2 π ∫ 0 1 y [ 1 − ( 1 − y ) ] d y + 2 π ∫ 1 e y ( 1 − ln y ) d y = 2 π . 2 5 y 5 2 | 0 1 + 2 π [ 1 2 y 2 − ( 1 2 y 2 ln y − 1 4 y 2 ) ] | 1 e = 4 5 π + 2 π [ 1 4 e 2 − 3 4 ] = π ( e 2 2 − 7 10 )
